summary.span: Changes the color space of a .

span.span: Changes the color space of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 使用方式資訊，請參閱[ColorConvertedBitmap 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md). 實作介面以最佳化多個屬性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只有在物件初始化期間，才會發生屬性變更。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 呼叫發出信號表示初始化已經開始和發出信號表示初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用建立的物件建構函式會自動初始化，以及屬性變更會被忽略。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored. A永遠不會快取。A is never cached. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的執行個體並用它來將色彩轉換。The following example shows how to create an instance of and use it to convert color.
